member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Wallets.WalletsModule
member.summary: This module is responsible for user wallet operations. User wallet is required to purchase NFT items

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Wallets.WalletsModule.IsUserHasBlockchainRequirementAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Checks if the user has a blockchain requirement
member.param: A token to cancel the operation.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Wallets.WalletsModule.CreateWallet(RGN.Modules.Wallets.RGNWalletCreateCallbackDelegate)
member.summary: Initiates a wallet creation process using web form
